title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Clearly define the project scope, objectives, and requirements for the decentralized lending platform. This includes identifying target users (individual lenders/borrowers, institutional investors, etc.), desired features (peer-to-peer lending, collateralized lending, interest rate calculation, risk assessment, etc.), regulatory compliance needs (KYC/AML, data privacy, etc.), success criteria (user adoption, loan volume, platform liquidity, etc.), and non-functional requirements (scalability, performance, security, etc.). Additionally, outline the overall system architecture, including the blockchain platform, smart contracts, and integrations with external systems (e.g., identity verification, credit scoring, payment gateways).

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture for the decentralized lending platform, including the blockchain network, smart contracts, integration with external systems (e.g., identity verification, credit scoring, payment gateways), user interfaces (web/mobile), and considerations for scalability, security, fault tolerance, regulatory compliance, and data privacy.

title: Develop Smart Contracts
description: Develop and test the smart contracts that will govern the lending process, including loan creation, repayment, and collateral management.

title: Build Frontend Application
description: Develop the user-facing frontend application for lenders and borrowers to interact with the lending platform.

title: Implement Identity and Credit Scoring Integration
description: Integrate the lending platform with third-party services for identity verification and credit scoring of borrowers.

title: Set up Blockchain Network
description: Configure and deploy the blockchain network that will host the lending platform's smart contracts and transactions.

title: Implement Security and Compliance Measures
description: Ensure the lending platform adheres to relevant security standards and regulatory compliance requirements, including data privacy, anti-money laundering, and know-your-customer (KYC) regulations.

title: Conduct Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Plan and execute comprehensive testing and quality assurance activities, including unit testing, integration testing, security testing, and user acceptance testing.
dependencies: Implement Identity and Credit Scoring Integration

title: Deploy and Launch Platform
description: Prepare for the final deployment and launch of the decentralized lending platform, including user documentation, marketing, and support resources.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Create comprehensive technical documentation for the lending platform, including system architecture, smart contract specifications, and API documentation.
dependencies: Implement Identity and Credit Scoring Integration
